All they’re interested in is turning out toenails—semitransparent, flexible sheets of a hornlike material, as defense against—whom?”
-Jorge Luis Borges, “Toenails”. 1960.
trans. Andrew Hurley, 1998.}} ==Useful Info== The bizarre '''toenail golem''' is a moderately powerful construct. They are not terribly dangerous, only posing a threat to flimsy elemental casters caught in melee with them for too long. They are extremely rare, but are slightly more common in the [[Volcano]]. ==Tips & Tricks== *They have resistance to all elemental attacks, so use physical damage or non-elemental [[Conjurations]] if you've got them. [[Fire]] and [[cold]] damage are only partially resisted, however, and will take them down with enough applications. *They are valid targets for [[Lee's Rapid Deconstruction]]
